mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.eam_system_id AS "eamSystemId", a.name AS "name", a.chinese_name AS "chineseName", a.manager AS "manager.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u5 ON u5.id = a.manager
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eam_system_module( id, eam_system_id, name, chinese_name, manager, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{eamSystemId}, #{name}, #{chineseName}, #{manager.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE eam_system_module SET eam_system_id = #{eamSystemId}, name = #{name}, chinese_name = #{chineseName}, manager = #{manager.id}, create_by = #{createBy.id}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
